description:
Experience superior durability and abrasion resistance with the Stormi.

It features a tough softshell material and a durable leather palm for long-lasting use. With a convenient pull tab, a handy suede nose wipe, and a comfortable acrylic cuff, this glove is designed for your convenience. The light insulation provides just the right amount of warmth for your high-intensity workouts.

  • 3M Thinsulate ® water resistant insulation
  • Knit storm cuff and a Nose wipe on the thumb
  • Abrasion resistant
  • Insulation crafted from recycled materials
name: Auclair Stormi Gloves - Women's
